comments_since_last_sample.body: Kapustin has been a discovery O_O thank you !
I don't think the prokofiev piano concerto nr. 3 is underrated, it is widely considered one of the greatest piano concertos and for me it is the greatest piano concerto of all time.

If you like the Parry, check out a capella motets by Brahms (Warum ist das Licht..., Schaffe in mir...) And Mendelssohn (Herr nun lässest du...). They're beautiful, tense, full of color. Some of the most lasting empress in from my choir gang past.
Do more of these hidden gems videos, please! I knew many of them but the Kapustin, the Sibelius, and the Britten were revelations. Thank you!
Did he try to say "Connaisseur" but the subtitle show "connoisseur". My French ass is happy!
